name: Harlow Solutions
description: Harlow Solutions is seeking a Graduate Software Developer eager to blend software development with real-world print production. Join a leading print management company and work on projects such as direct mail, scratch cards, and promotional games. Ideal candidates are recent graduates in Software Development or Computer Science with problem-solving skills and attention to detail. Benefits include hands-on experience, professional growth opportunities, a company pension, sick pay, and a yearly bonus. Full-time, in-person role. Apply by 08/11/2024. Work authorization for the UK required.
